# MARMoT

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This package contains the function to apply MARMoT balancing technique; furthermore it contains a function for computing the Deloof's approximation of the average rank (and also a parallelized version) and a function to compute the Absolute Standardized Bias.

## Installation

You can install the development version of MARMoT like so:

``` r
devtools::install_github("AlbertoCalore/MARMoT")
```

## Example

This is a basic example of the function "MARMoT":

```{r example}
library(MARMoT)
out = MARMoT(data = MARMoT_data, confounders = c("race", "age"), treatment = "hospital", n.cores = 1)
```
